member.param: The number of channels to request. 1-2 is the valid range.
The user-local name of the source, used to identify the source later.
The frame requested frame size. The higher the size, the more latency and more quality.
member.remarks: The server may not agree with the bitrate you request, do not set up audio based on this target, but on the bitrate of the source you actually receive.
